participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Mike is a dedicated and patient coach who enjoys bonding with his sons through sports. He appreciates quiet evenings with a glass of wine.
participant_1.background: i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is creative and enjoys expressing herself through music. She's friendly and has a playful side, often sharing her love for pets.
participant_2.background: my pets name is charlie. i produce music for artists. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza.
